comment.author: 51809917@N00
comment._content: I was there just recently!  Great photo!

comment.author: 76774906@N00
comment._content: I was born not that far awy from here in 1940. This bridge has always been a part of my life. Climbed it in the moonlight on a hot summer night once when I was young and foolish. Remember riding over it in a Dayliner coach in the 1950s.

comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called History of Canadian Science and Technology, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
